decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

The proposal would have an eaves height of 3.05m thereby failing to accord with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, A1 (i) the GPDO (2015) as amended. As such prior approval is REFUSED.

Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The local planning authority conclude that the developer has not provided the correct height of the eaves of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, as such the proposal does not accord with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A.4 (a) (iii) of the GPDO 2015

Reason : 3 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The local planning authority conclude that the developer has not provided the correct maximum height of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, as such the proposal does not accord with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A.4 (a) (ii) of the GPDO 2015
description: APPLICATION TO DETERMINE WHETHER PRIOR APPROVAL IS REQUIRED, IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 4.97M, MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF 4M AND EAVES HEIGHT OF 3M
